languages.text: Борьба Баронессы Теней и маршала Простора стала самым крупным конфликтом между обитателями полумрака и блюстителями закона. Люди маршала вскрывали бандитские логова одно за другим, пока Дворец Правосудия не взлетел на воздух вместе с львиной долей Арбитес. Это привело к полномасштабной войне, в которой арбитры истребляли людей Баронессы целыми семьями, не считаясь с сопутствующими потерями. Жители Коронуса, на годы втянутые в эту междоусобицу, прокляли обе стороны.

The struggle between the Baroness of Shadows and the Marshal of the Expanse became the largest-ever conflict between the underworld and the law. One after another, the bandits' lairs fell to the Marshal's forces, until one day, an explosion destroyed the Palace of Justice, along with most of the Arbites. In the full-scale war that ensued, Arbitrators exterminated entire families of the Baroness's people, paying no mind to collateral damage. After years of being dragged into the internecine carnage, the sector's inhabitants found themselves cursing both sides alike.
languages.original_text: Борьба Баронессы Теней и маршала Простора стала самым крупным конфликтом между обитателями полумрака и блюстителями закона. Это привело к полномасштабной войне, в которой арбитры истребляли людей Баронессы целыми семьями, не считаясь с сопутствующими потерями. Жители Коронуса, на годы втянутые в эту междоусобицу, прокляли обе стороны.

traits.locale_text: The struggle between the Shadow Baroness and the Marshal of the Expanse became the largest-ever conflict between the underworld and the law. One after another, the bandits' lairs fell to the marshal's forces, until one day a blast destroyed the Palace of Justice along with most of the Arbites. In the full-scale war that ensued, Arbitrators exterminated entire families of the Baroness's people, paying no mind to collateral damage. Koronus inhabitants were cursing both sides after years of being dragged into the internecine carnage.

languages.text: Der Kampf zwischen der Baronin der Schatten und dem Marschall der Ausdehnung wurde zum größten Konflikt zwischen der Unterwelt und dem Gesetz.. Die Verstecke der Banditen unterlagen der Reihe nach den Truppen des Marschalls, bis eines Tages eine Explosion den Justizpalast zerstörte, zusammen mit dem Großteil der Arbites. Bei dem daraus resultierenden Krieg töteten Arbitratoren ganze Familien aus den Kreisen der Baronin, ohne jede Rücksicht auf Kollateralschäden. Die Einwohner des Sektors wurden über Jahre in die internen Gemetzel hineingezogen und verfluchten irgendwann beide Seiten gleichermaßen.
languages.original_text: The struggle between the Baroness of Shadows and the Marshal of the Expanse became the largest-ever conflict between the underworld and the law. One after another, the bandits' lairs fell to the Marshal's forces, until one day, an explosion destroyed the Palace of Justice, along with most of the Arbites. In the full-scale war that ensued, Arbitrators exterminated entire families of the Baroness's people, paying no mind to collateral damage. After years of being dragged into the internecine carnage, the sector's inhabitants found themselves cursing both sides alike.

traits.locale_text: Der Kampf zwischen der Baronin der Schatten und dem Marschall der Ausdehnung wurde zum größten Konflikt zwischen der Unterwelt und dem Gesetz.. Die Verstecke der Banditen unterlagen der Reihe nach den Truppen des Marschalls, bis eines Tages eine Explosion den Justizpalast zerstörte, zusammen mit dem Großteil der Arbites. Bei dem daraus resultierenden Krieg töteten Arbitratoren ganze Familien aus den Kreisen der Baronin, ohne jede Rücksicht auf Kollateralschäden. Die Einwohner des Sektors wurden über Jahre in die internen Gemetzel hineingezogen und verfluchten irgendwann beide Seiten gleichermaßen.

languages.text: La lutte qui opposa la baronne des ombres au maréchal des Étendues devint le plus grand conflit entre le monde de la pègre et les autorités de l'Imperium. L'un après l'autre, les repaires des bandits tombèrent aux mains des forces du maréchal, jusqu'au jour où une explosion détruisit le palais de justice, emportant avec lui la plupart des membres de l'Arbites. Dans la guerre qui s'ensuivit, les arbitrators exterminèrent des familles entières des fidèles de la baronne sans se soucier des dommages collatéraux. Après des années à subir les affres de ce qui s'apparentait plus à un carnage qu'à une simple lutte intestine, les habitants du secteur se mirent à haïr autant un camp que l'autre.
languages.original_text: The struggle between the Baroness of Shadows and the Marshal of the Expanse became the largest-ever conflict between the underworld and the law. One after another, the bandits' lairs fell to the Marshal's forces, until one day, an explosion destroyed the Palace of Justice, along with most of the Arbites. In the full-scale war that ensued, Arbitrators exterminated entire families of the Baroness's people, paying no mind to collateral damage. After years of being dragged into the internecine carnage, the sector's inhabitants found themselves cursing both sides alike.

traits.locale_text: La lutte qui opposa la baronne des ombres au maréchal des Étendues devint le plus grand conflit entre le monde de la pègre et les autorités de l'Imperium. L'un après l'autre, les repaires des bandits tombèrent aux mains des forces du maréchal, jusqu'au jour où une explosion détruisit le palais de justice, emportant avec lui la plupart des membres de l'Arbites. Après des années à subir les affres de ce qui s'apparentait plus à un carnage qu'à une simple lutte intestine, les habitants du secteur se mirent à haïr autant un camp que l'autre.

languages.text: 阴影女爵与科罗努斯扩区元帅之间的明争暗斗，最终升级成了流血冲突。这也是科罗努斯扩区有史以来，法务部与地下势力之间规模最大的冲突。元帅的部队铲除了一个又一个违法分子的巢穴，直到某天，一场可怕的爆炸摧毁了正义大殿，大部分法务部成员也在爆炸中葬身火海。在这之后，双方爆发了全面战争，法务官屠戮了阴影女爵的整个家族，完全不在乎对平民造成的损害。这场大屠杀持续了很多年，整个星区的居民都对双方恨之入骨。
languages.original_text: The struggle between the Baroness of Shadows and the Marshal of the Expanse became the largest-ever conflict between the underworld and the law. One after another, the bandits' lairs fell to the Marshal's forces, until one day, an explosion destroyed the Palace of Justice, along with most of the Arbites. In the full-scale war that ensued, Arbitrators exterminated entire families of the Baroness's people, paying no mind to collateral damage. After years of being dragged into the internecine carnage, the sector's inhabitants found themselves cursing both sides alike.

阴影女爵与科罗努斯扩区元帅之间的明争暗斗，最终升级成了流血冲突。这也是科罗努斯扩区有史以来，法务部与地下势力之间规模最大的冲突。元帅的部队铲除了一个又一个违法分子的巢穴，直到某天，一场可怕的爆炸摧毁了正义大殿，大部分法务部成员也在爆炸中葬身火海。在这之后，双方爆发了全面战争，法务官屠戮了阴影女爵的整个家族，完全不在乎对平民造成的损害。这场大屠杀持续了很多年，科罗努斯扩区的居民对双方恨之入骨。

languages.text: La lucha entre la baronesa de las sombras y el Mariscal de la Extensión se convirtió en el mayor conflicto de la historia entre los delincuentes y la ley. Una tras otra, las bases de los bandidos cayeron ante las fuerzas del Mariscal, hasta que un día, una explosión destruyó el Palacio de la Justicia junto con la mayor parte del Arbites. En la guerra total consecuente, los Arbitrator exterminaron a familias enteras de los súbditos de la baronesa, sin preocuparse por los daños colaterales. Tras años atrapados en la masacre intestina, los habitantes del sector acabaron maldiciendo a ambos bandos.
languages.original_text: The struggle between the Baroness of Shadows and the Marshal of the Expanse became the largest-ever conflict between the underworld and the law. One after another, the bandits' lairs fell to the Marshal's forces, until one day, an explosion destroyed the Palace of Justice, along with most of the Arbites. In the full-scale war that ensued, Arbitrators exterminated entire families of the Baroness's people, paying no mind to collateral damage. After years of being dragged into the internecine carnage, the sector's inhabitants found themselves cursing both sides alike.

traits.locale_text: La lucha entre la baronesa de las sombras y el Mariscal de la Extensión se convirtió en el mayor conflicto de la historia entre los delincuentes y la ley. Una tras otra, las bases de los bandidos cayeron ante las fuerzas del Mariscal, hasta que un día, una explosión destruyó el Palacio de la Justicia junto con la mayor parte del Arbites. En la guerra total consecuente, los Arbitrator exterminaron a familias enteras de los súbditos de la baronesa, sin preocuparse por los daños colaterales. Tras años atrapados en la masacre intestina, los habitantes del sector acabaron maldiciendo a ambos bandos.

languages.text: 影の男爵夫人とエクスパンスの将帥との闘いは、地下世界と法の間で最大の紛争となった。盗賊の隠れ家が次々と将帥の部隊に陥落し、やがてある日、司法宮が爆破され、高等裁定局のほとんどが失われた。続く全面戦争の中で、アービトレイターたちは巻き添え被害など気にせず、影の男爵夫人の一族全体を容赦なく殲滅した。何年も内戦に巻き込まれた後、星域の住民たちは両者を同様に呪うようになった。
languages.original_text: The struggle between the Baroness of Shadows and the Marshal of the Expanse became the largest-ever conflict between the underworld and the law. One after another, the bandits' lairs fell to the Marshal's forces, until one day, an explosion destroyed the Palace of Justice, along with most of the Arbites. In the full-scale war that ensued, Arbitrators exterminated entire families of the Baroness's people, paying no mind to collateral damage. After years of being dragged into the internecine carnage, the sector's inhabitants found themselves cursing both sides alike.

traits.locale_text: 影の男爵夫人とエクスパンスの将帥との闘いは、地下世界と法の間で最大の紛争となった。盗賊の隠れ家が次々と将帥の部隊に陥落し、やがてある日、司法宮が爆破され、高等裁定局のほとんどが失われた。続く全面戦争の中で、アービトレイターたちは巻き添え被害など気にせず、影の男爵夫人の一族全体を容赦なく殲滅した。何年も内戦に巻き込まれた後、星域の住民たちは両者を同様に呪うようになった。

languages.text: Gölgelerin Baronesi ile Enginlik'in Miralayı arasındaki anlaşmazlık, yeraltı dünyası ile kanun arasında yaşanan gelmiş geçmiş en büyük çatışmaya dönüştü. Haydut inleri birer birer Miralay'ın kuvvetlerinin eline geçti. Ta ki bir gün bir patlamayla Adalet Sarayı ve Arbites'in büyük bir kısmı yerle bir olana kadar. Buna takiben başlayan topyekûn savaşta Yargıcılar, Barones'in insanlarının ailelerini tamamen katlederken verdikleri tali hasarı umursamadı. Yıllarca bu kıyasıya kıyıma sürüklenen sektör sakinleri, sonunda her iki tarafa da lanet okur hâle geldi.
languages.original_text: The struggle between the Baroness of Shadows and the Marshal of the Expanse became the largest-ever conflict between the underworld and the law. One after another, the bandits' lairs fell to the Marshal's forces, until one day, an explosion destroyed the Palace of Justice, along with most of the Arbites. In the full-scale war that ensued, Arbitrators exterminated entire families of the Baroness's people, paying no mind to collateral damage. After years of being dragged into the internecine carnage, the sector's inhabitants found themselves cursing both sides alike.

traits.locale_text: Gölgelerin Baronesi ile Enginlik'in Miralayı arasındaki anlaşmazlık, yeraltı dünyası ile kanun arasında yaşanan gelmiş geçmiş en büyük çatışmaya dönüştü. Haydut inleri birer birer Miralay'ın kuvvetlerinin eline geçti. Ta ki bir gün bir patlamayla Adalet Sarayı ve Arbites'in büyük bir kısmı yerle bir olana kadar. Buna takiben başlayan topyekûn savaşta, Yargıcılar Barones'in insanlarının ailelerini tamamen katlederken verdikleri tali hasarı umursamadılar. Yıllarca bu kıyasıya kıyıma sürüklenen sektör sakinleri, sonunda her iki tarafa da lanet okur hâle geldi.
